name: Bibimbap
ingredients: Rice, vegetables (carrots, cucumber, bean sprouts, spinach, mushrooms), beef, gochujang (red pepper paste), sesame oil, soy sauce
description: A popular Korean rice dish topped with various seasoned vegetables, meat, and gochujang sauce.

name: Japchae
ingredients: Sweet potato noodles, beef, spinach, carrots, mushrooms, onions, sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar
description: A stir-fried Korean noodle dish made with sweet potato noodles and a variety of vegetables.

name: Kimchi
ingredients: Napa cabbage, red pepper flakes, garlic, ginger, fish sauce, salt, sugar
description: A traditional Korean side dish made with fermented vegetables, most commonly Napa cabbage, and spicy seasoning.

name: Korean Fried Chicken
ingredients: Chicken wings or drumettes, cornstarch, flour, baking powder, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, gochujang (red pepper paste), honey
description: Crispy fried chicken with a sweet and spicy sauce, often served as an appetizer or snack.

name: Tteokbokki
ingredients: Rice cakes, fish cakes, gochujang (red pepper paste), sugar, soy sauce, garlic, onion, green onion
description: A popular Korean street food made with spicy, stir-fried rice cakes and fish cakes.

name: Samgyeopsal
ingredients: Pork belly, garlic, salt, sesame oil, soybean paste, lettuce, ssamjang (spicy dipping sauce), kimchi
description: A Korean BBQ dish consisting of thick slices of pork belly, often grilled at the table and wrapped in lettuce with a variety of condiments.

name: Haemul Pajeon
ingredients: Seafood (shrimp, squid), scallions, flour, eggs, water, salt, pepper
description: A savory Korean pancake made with seafood and scallions, often served as a snack or appetizer.

name: Galbi
ingredients: Beef short ribs, soy sauce, sugar, garlic, sesame oil, scallions, black pepper
description: A popular Korean BBQ dish made with marinated beef short ribs, often grilled at the table and served with various condiments.

name: Jajangmyeon
ingredients: Noodles, black bean paste, pork belly, onion, zucchini, potato, sugar, oil
description: A Korean-Chinese dish made with thick noodles in a savory black bean sauce with diced pork and vegetables.

name: Kimbap
ingredients: Rice, seaweed, carrots, spinach, cucumber, pickled radish, eggs, ham, crab meat, sesame oil
description: A Korean rice roll similar to sushi, filled with a variety of vegetables, meat, and other ingredients.

name: Bulgogi
ingredients: Beef, soy sauce, sugar, garlic, sesame oil, scallions, black pepper
description: A popular Korean BBQ dish made with marinated beef, often grilled at the table and served with various condiments.

name: Jjimdak
ingredients: Chicken, soy sauce, sugar, garlic, ginger, onion, potato, carrots, scallions
description: A Korean braised chicken dish with a sweet and savory soy sauce-based broth, often served with noodles or rice.

name: Kongnamul Guk
ingredients: Soybean sprouts, beef or anchovy broth, garlic, scallions, sesame oil
description: A light Korean soup made with soybean sprouts and a flavorful broth.

name: Mul Naengmyeon
ingredients: Buckwheat noodles, beef broth, pear, vinegar, mustard, sesame oil, sliced beef, boiled egg, cucumber
description: A Korean cold noodle soup made with buckwheat noodles, beef broth, and a tangy sauce.

name: Budae Jjigae
ingredients: Spam, hot dogs, instant noodles, kimchi, tofu, onions, scallions, garlic, gochujang (red pepper paste)
description: A Korean stew made with a variety of ingredients, including Spam and instant noodles, that was popularized after the Korean War.

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
ingredients: Kimchi, rice, bacon or ham, onion, garlic, sesame oil, soy sauce, scallions
description: A Korean fried rice dish made with kimchi and a variety of other ingredients, often served as a quick and easy meal.

name: Yukgaejang
ingredients: Beef, scallions, garlic, ginger, bean sprouts, fernbrake, mushrooms, hot pepper flakes, soy sauce
description: A spicy Korean soup made with shredded beef and a variety of vegetables and seasonings.

name: Sundubu Jjigae
ingredients: Soft tofu, clams or beef, garlic, onion, zucchini, mushrooms, scallions, gochujang (red pepper paste)
description: A Korean stew made with soft tofu and a variety of ingredients, often served with rice or other side dishes.

name: Galbi JJim
ingredients: Short ribs, scallion, onions, peppers, carrots, mushrooms, soy sauce, brown sugar, rice wine, sesame oil, garlic, water
description: A traditional Korean dish made with braised beef short ribs in a savory and slightly sweet sauce.

name: Dak Galbi
ingredients: Chicken, sweet potato, cabbage, scallions, rice cake, gochujang (red pepper paste), soy sauce, garlic
description: A Korean stir-fry dish made with marinated chicken, sweet potato, and other vegetables, often served with rice or noodles.
